    Hide or show igv track labels

    showTrackLabels.Rd

    Hide or show igv track labels

    Usage

    # S4 method for igvR
showTrackLabels(obj, newState)

    Arguments

    obj

    An object of class igvR

    newState

    logigal, either TRUE or FALSE

    Value

    ""
